text: Ia Kantrin Igharazibar otivir gumaziba, ia kamaghɨn fo, Judaba, uan gumazibar mɨkarzir mogomebar iniba aghori. Egha me kamaghɨn ia dɨbori, ia gumazir mɨkarzir mogomebar iniba aghorir puvatɨziba. Arazir kam kamakɨn, gumaziba uari uan mɨkarzir mogomebar iniba aghori. Eghtɨ ia deravɨra nɨghnɨgh, ia fomɨra Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamizibar mɨn ike.
